body: @Ino Uzumaki alright gg. We both have our own different opinions but I can respect that
Please try to understand what i mean....i dont want say anything else because we have our like and dislike. The important is respect each other. I want only found friends to chat nothing more

Yeah NaruHina is Canon so what? Canon & Crack are just words. Do you prefer support something only because is popular or do you prefer support something because you like it? Be honest. Popularity is nothing compared from our desires. And only becase some pairing are "Canon"`,do you really think is good for people watch ways the same thing? Cmon dont lie to yourself please
@Ino Uzumaki, damn idk, maybe because it's canon, the MAIN character of the anime is in the pairing, and it's arguably the most popular couple in the show
@Ana72, crying? For ask only something different instead watch the same two character over and over again? What is your problem?
@Ino Uzumaki, its been 3 years and you're still salty? Keep crying lmao
